meanings.definition: most subtle or delicate in meaning or intent
meanings.sent1: The subtilest hint of a smile crossed her face.
meanings.sent2: She understood the subtilest nuances of the poem.
meanings.sent3: The detective's subtilest clue led to the surprising revelation.
meanings.sent4: His subtilest manipulation of words left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The subtilest fragrance of the flowers filled the room delicately.

meanings.definition: most skillful or clever in achieving a desired result
meanings.sent1: He was the subtilest craftsman in the village.
meanings.sent2: The magician's subtilest trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The subtilest move in the game caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her subtilest negotiation tactics always brought success.
meanings.sent5: The subtilest strategist in the war devised a brilliant plan.
